title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: horsehair, linen
Technique: satin weave
creditline: Gift of Mary M. Kenway from the estate of Sarah B. Russell
description: Shiny, stiff black fabric woven in 5-harness satin. The warps are heavy brown linen; the wefts are each a single horse hair.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: horsehair, linen
